name: Notification System
description: A system for managing and delivering notifications to users

functional_requirements.name: Notification Creation
functional_requirements.description: System should allow creating notifications with different priorities

functional_requirements.name: Notification Delivery
functional_requirements.description: System should support multiple delivery channels (email, SMS, in-app)

functional_requirements.name: Notification Templates
functional_requirements.description: System should support customizable notification templates

functional_requirements.name: Delivery Status Tracking
functional_requirements.description: System should track and report delivery status of notifications

non_functional_requirements.name: Performance
non_functional_requirements.description: System should handle at least 1000 notifications per minute

non_functional_requirements.name: Security
non_functional_requirements.description: All notification data should be encrypted at rest and in transit

constraints.name: Compliance
constraints.description: System must comply with data protection regulations

constraints.name: Integration
constraints.description: System must integrate with existing user management system

stakeholders.name: Administrators
stakeholders.needs: Manage notification settings and monitor delivery
